write_up: Garage rock is fun, that’s the whole point of it. ‘Imaginary Person’ takes that fun and adds psychological edge to it, ruining the fun for some people, but for others, it takes what would be only a few minutes of fun and turns it into a whole day of it. I just mean, from playing the song over and over again. Because you, you are, an imaginary person. You’re in my head. But I am certain, you are real. Yeah!
